core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix African heritage with modern minimalism.
Emotion First: Every pixel must convey 'Quiet Strength' and 'Ubuntu Warmth'.
Content is King: Tell the story of rebuilding and redemption.
Zoom In: Focus on faces, hands, and textures to create intimacy.
Negative Space: Use generous breathing room to reflect dignity.
anti_patterns: No corporate blues or generic tech gradients.
No crowded layouts - let the content breathe.

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, and emotional statements.

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI elements, forms, and data.

accents.usage: Pull quotes, testimonials, and special emphasis.

primary.name: Burnt Orange
primary.usage: Primary CTAs, key highlights, active states.

colors.theme_strategy: Light Theme with Earthy Warmth. Avoid stark white (#FFFFFF) for main backgrounds; use Warm Off-White (#F9F7F2) to reduce eye strain and add organic feel.

grid_system.marketing: Bento Grid (Mode A) - Asymmetrical, artistic, breathing room.
grid_system.dashboard: High Density Grid (Mode B) - Structured, data-focused (for Gap Test results).

spacing.scale: Tailwind Scale (p-4, p-8, p-12, p-16, p-24, p-32)
spacing.philosophy: Generous spacing. Use 2-3x more padding than standard templates.

buttons.primary: bg-[#CC5500] text-white hover:bg-[#A04000] rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border-2 border-[#5C4033] text-[#5C4033] hover:bg-[#5C4033] hover:text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-[#5C4033] hover:bg-[#5C4033]/10 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-all

cards.style: bg-white border border-[#5C4033]/10 rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300
cards.marketing: p-8 or p-12. Focus on typography and negative space.

inputs.style: bg-[#F9F7F2] border border-[#5C4033]/20 rounded-lg px-4 py-3 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#CC5500] focus:border-transparent transition-all

navigation.style: Glassmorphism (Crystal). bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-[#5C4033]/5 sticky top-0 z-50

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle grain or paper textures on backgrounds to avoid 'digital flatness'.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders with low opacity (#5C4033/10) for structure.
visual_enhancers.icons: Phosphor Icons (Duotone) or Lucide React (customized with Gold accent).

media.image_style: Authentic, candid, warm lighting. Avoid staged stock photos. Focus on connection and emotion.

motion.philosophy: Slow, smooth, deliberate. No jerky movements.
motion.scroll: Use Lenis for smooth scrolling momentum.
motion.micro_interactions: Subtle scale up (1.02) on hover for cards. Color shifts for buttons.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text meets APCA standards. Use dark brown text on light backgrounds.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings in Burnt Orange (#CC5500).

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a movement, not just a website. Use the provided image URLs for specific sections. Implement the 'Six Trainers' framework using the Bento Grid layout. Ensure the 'Gap Test' feels like a journey of self-discovery, not a tax form. Use the color palette strictly. Do not deviate from the 'Quiet Strength' aesthetic.
